title: Clan tag
body:
i'm straggling to get my clan tag to show up in game and next to my name in game.
any ways that i can sort this out?
TY

replies.body:
Hey there,

In the clubs tab at the bottom right of your client, ensure the club whose tag you want to appear has the pin checked for it. (See below)

http://puu.sh/obHiW/4b137f958f.jpg
